A `google-signin` element looks like this:

Styling

The sign in element can be styled by using using a combination of the width, height, and theme attributes

Width

Wide:

Standard:

Icon Only:

Height

Tall:

Standard:

Short:

Theme

Dark:

Light:

Branding

Based on the scopes being used, the branding for the button will change to match the scopes.

General Google Scopes

For most Google scopes the branding will use the Google logo and blue color scheme:

Dark Theme

Light Theme

Google Plus Scopes

For Google Plus and social scopes the branding will use the Google+ logo and red color scheme:

Dark Theme

Light Theme

google-signin-aware

The google-signin-aware element can be used within other elements to request additional scopes.
